short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your Salesforce Orgs with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce Quick Tabs: Your One-Click Salesforce Access

Tired of manually logging into multiple Salesforce orgs and opening specific tabs? Salesforce Quick Tabs is the solution you've been waiting for.

Key Features:

- Effortless Org Access: Quickly access your Salesforce orgs with a single click.
- Customizable Tabs: Define and save the exact tabs you need for each org.
- Multiple Org Support: Register and manage multiple Salesforce orgs seamlessly.
- Enhanced Productivity: Save time and streamline your workflow with this intuitive extension.

How it Works:

- Add Your Orgs: Easily register your Salesforce orgs with their respective credentials.
- Customize Your Tabs: Define the specific tabs you want to open for each org.
- One-Click Access: Launch your desired Salesforce org and tabs with a single click.

Simplify Your Salesforce Experience Today!
